channel.title: 508 Npc Spawn!

item.title: 508 Npc Spawn!
item.dc:creator: @SethScape_508 SethScape 508
item.description:
@SethScape_508 wrote:

hello i would like to know how to make an npc spawn, what i mean by this is , im gonna make it so when you kill a certain npc another npc will appear right infront of you, etc… so whats the code for this??? i have this code:

Engine.newSummonNPC(6920, p.absX, p.absY+1, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false, p.playerId);

This summons the npc like i want but the only problem is, it acts like a summoned type monster, i mean it makes you do the “summon emote” then it follows you like a summoned creature. i dont want this i want it to just appear infront of you or in a certain place… so yeah i hope you guys can help me.

Read full topic
